Str.FuncTxt:
local abilBuff1 = info.GetBuffByName(self:GetHandleVal(), "GoddessProtection_Buff")
local abilBuff2 = info.GetBuffByName(self:GetHandleVal(), "GoddessPunishment_Buff")
local abilBuff3 = info.GetBuffByName(self:GetHandleVal(), "GoddessBlessing_Buff")
if abilBuff1 ~= nil then return "voice_cleric_m_holysmash_b_shot"
elseif abilBuff2 ~= nil then return "voice_cleric_m_holysmash_p_shot"
elseif abilBuff3 ~= nil then local random = IMCRandom(1, 2) if random == 1 then return "voice_cleric_m_holysmash_b_shot" else return "voice_cleric_m_holysmash_p_shot" end
else
end

local abilBuff1 = info.GetBuffByName(self:GetHandleVal(), "GoddessProtection_Buff")
local abilBuff2 = info.GetBuffByName(self:GetHandleVal(), "GoddessPunishment_Buff")
local abilBuff3 = info.GetBuffByName(self:GetHandleVal(), "GoddessBlessing_Buff")
if abilBuff1 ~= nil then return "voice_cleric_f_holysmash_b_shot"
elseif abilBuff2 ~= nil then return "voice_cleric_f_holysmash_p_shot"
elseif abilBuff3 ~= nil then local random = IMCRandom(1, 2) if random == 1 then return "voice_cleric_f_holysmash_b_shot" else return "voice_cleric_f_holysmash_p_shot" end
else
end
local func_name = 'get_remove_buff_tooltip_' .. TryGetProp(obj, 'ClassName', 'None') local func = _G[func_name] if func == nil then return end return func(obj.Level)

Num.FuncTxt: local x, y, z = GetPos(self) return x
local x, y, z = GetPos(self) return y
local x, y, z = GetPos(self) return z
